title: Calories in Syrup at Starbucks
meta_description: Discover calories in syrup at Starbucks per pump, including carbs, sugars, and nutrition details for popular flavors like vanilla or caramel.
assumptions: Per pump of classic flavored syrup (e.g., vanilla, raspberry); ~0.25 fl oz (7.5 ml); no sugar-free unless specified.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, formulation, and exact serving; sugar-free options differ. Check Starbucks app or labels for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One pump of Starbucks syrup contains about 20 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one pump of Starbucks syrup?
faqs.a: About 20 calories per pump for classic flavors.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Starbucks syrup?
faqs.a: 5 g carbs per pump, all from sugars; no fiber.

faqs.q: Do all Starbucks syrups have the same calories?
faqs.a: Most classic flavors are 20 kcal per pump, but mocha or specialty may vary slightly.
Typically 0 calories per pump, using artificial sweeteners.

faqs.q: How many pumps in a standard Starbucks drink?
faqs.a: Varies: 2 pumps in tall, 3 in grande, 4 in venti; multiply by 20 kcal per pump.
